data.eml:eml: A review of the marine and brackish-water species of Testudinella (Rotifera: Monogononta, Testudinellidae), with the description of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article De, Willem H. (2009): A review of the marine and brackish-water species of Testudinella (Rotifera: Monogononta, Testudinellidae), with the description of two new species. Zootaxa 2092: 1-20, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.187516
